title: Edinburgh/Stockbridge and Canonmills
name: Edina Lock & Key Co. Ltd.
directions: at the foot of Dundas St.
hours: 9:30AM-5:30PM Mon, Tue, Thu, Fri, Sat, early closing 1PM Wed
content: If you like the brass door furniture you've seen on the traditional townhouses in the New Town, this is the place to pick up the knobs, knockers, numbers and letter-boxes you need to make your own front door look just the same. A real treasure-trove of a shop.
